statements.statements: for $L.i = 1 to lng(denull(source.fields in $L.link.append)) do ($L.p=$L.x+$L.i;$L.p in add.query in $L.link.source=$L.i in add.query in $L.link.append;$L.p in comment in $L.link.source=$L.i in comment in $L.link.append;$L.p in javascript.pre in $L.link.source=$L.i in javascript.pre in $L.link.append;$L.p in javascript.post in $L.link.source=$L.i in javascript.post in $L.link.append;$L.p in link.expressions in $L.link.source=$L.i in link.expressions in $L.link.append;$L.p in post.expressions in $L.link.source=$L.i in post.expressions in $L.link.append;$L.p in project.source.fields in $L.link.source=$L.i in project.source.fields in $L.link.append;$L.p in project.target.fields in $L.link.source=$L.i in project.target.fields in $L.link.append;$L.p in qbe.format in $L.link.source=$L.i in qbe.format in $L.link.append;$L.p in skip.query.rewrite in $L.link.source=$L.i in skip.query.rewrite in $L.link.append;$L.p in sort.fields in $L.link.source=$L.i in sort.fields in $L.link.append;$L.p in source.fields in $L.link.source=$L.i in source.fields in $L.link.append;$L.p in structure in $L.link.source=$L.i in structure in $L.link.append;$L.p in target.files in $L.link.source=$L.i in target.files in $L.link.append;$L.p in target.fields in $L.link.source=$L.i in target.fields in $L.link.append;$L.p in target.formats in $L.link.source=$L.i in target.formats in $L.link.append;$L.p in target.sort.field in $L.link.source=$L.i in target.sort.field in $L.link.append;$L.p in target.sort.order in $L.link.source=$L.i in target.sort.order in $L.link.append)
